turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: place an order for pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can do that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust should i write down.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: regular crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One I want Meat Lovers with extra cheese, and one I want pepperoni with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you must really love cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 2 small pizzas, 1 meat lovers with extra cheese, and 1 pepperoni with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yap, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $25.02 is the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've charged the card on file and submitted your order. it'll be freshly baked and ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, I don't need anything else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
